name: Mick Gordon
description:
'''Michael John Gordon''' is an Australian composer, record producer, musician, and sound designer, composing music primarily for video games.

Gordon has composed for several first-person shooters, including ''[[Atomic Heart (video game)|Atomic Heart]]'', ''[[LawBreakers]]'', ''[[Wolfenstein: The New Order]]'', ''[[Wolfenstein: The Old Blood]],'' ''[[Prey (2017 video game)|Prey]],'' the soft [[Doom (2016 video game)|reboot of ''Doom'']] and its sequel ''[[Doom Eternal]]'', ''[[Wolfenstein II: The New Colossus]]'', and the first two seasons of the 2013 fighting game ''[[Killer Instinct (2013 video game)|Killer Instinct]].''
